content:
Hi all. I’ve been using rust for a while and have come across an idea I’d like to see in the language. I’ve created an issue for it and would like to see what others think of the idea.
I’ve not worked on the compiler before but if it’s an idea worth pursuing, I’d be willing to work on a formal RFC and attempt to implement it myself.

@Oscar Rainford This exact syntax has been proposed in many different places, including a few pre-RFC threads on the internals forum. Many people are in favor of it, and it's absolutely worth pursuing. It just needs one or more people willing to champion it.
I would success reaching out to some of the people who have previously proposed it, and collaborating.
Some of them may have RFC experience, and I've found it helpful to pair-author RFCs before.
